SEARCH
Package Server.IndexStorageBarrel

Class IndexStorageBarrel

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Server.IndexStorageBarrel.IndexStorageBarrel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, IndexStorageBarrelInterface
public class IndexStorageBarrel extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IndexStorageBarrelInterface
The IndexStorageBarrel class represents a storage barrel for indexing and storing crawl data. It implements the IndexStorageBarrelInterface interface and extends the UnicastRemoteObject class to enable remote method invocation (RMI) functionality.

The IndexStorageBarrel class provides methods for inserting crawl data, retrieving crawl data, searching for data based on a query, and performing other operations related to indexing and storage.

This class also includes a main method for starting the IndexStorageBarrel as a standalone application.

See Also:

    • startRMI

      private void startRMI()
      Starts the RMI server for the IndexStorageBarrel. This method creates a registry and binds the remote reference of the barrel to the registry. If an exception occurs during the process, it logs the error using LogUtil.

    • retrieveAndRankData

      private List<SearchData> retrieveAndRankData(String query, int pageNumber, boolean tfIdfSort)
      Retrieves and ranks search data based on the given query and page number.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query
      pageNumber - the page number of the search results
      tfIdfSort - whether to sort the search results by TF-IDF score
      Returns:
      a list of SearchData objects representing the ranked search results
